channel.title: species distribution on BIDS- Environmental
channel.description: Recent content in species distribution on BIDS- Environmental

item.title: Trout and Food Species
item.description: Introduction In this post we will look at some spatial data of Rainbow Trout (Oncorhynchus mykiss) and one of thier food sources Blue Winged Olives (Baetis tricaudatus). We will take a look using publically available observation data from the GBIF database. See previous posts here and here for other examples of species occurance data. Load the necessary R libraries. library(rgbif) library(tidyverse) library(data.table) library(maps) library(leaflet) Pull in the species observation data from GBIF.
